Description copied from class: Node
Replace this node with another one. This node father becomes null.

goalValue

public KnownSymbolicValue goalValue()
Returns the symbolic value associated to this node. This value is the goal (guessed) symbolic attribute value associated to this leaf. This value is computed thanks to the learning set associated to this node.

Overrides:
goalValue in class LeafNode
Returns:
The goal attribute value associated to this node, or -1 if this value has not been fixed.

getGoalValueDistribution

public double[] getGoalValueDistribution()
Description copied from class: LeafNode
Returns the distribution of goal values. The i-th element of the returned array gives the number of learning items matching this node having the i-th goal value.

Overrides:
getGoalValueDistribution in class LeafNode
Returns:
The goal attribute value distribution. Can be null if no distribution defined.

setGoalValueDistribution

public void setGoalValueDistribution(double[] distribution)
Description copied from class: LeafNode
Sets the distribution of goal values. This array is represented by an array of double. The i-th element of the returned array gives the proportion of items matching this node having the i-th goal value.

Overrides:
setGoalValueDistribution in class LeafNode
Parameters:
distribution - The goal attribute value distribution. Can be null to unset the current distribution.

goalValuesDistribution

public double[] goalValuesDistribution()
Returns the distribution of goal values. This distribution is represented by an array such that its i-th element is proportional to the weight of the i-th goal value. The sum of the elements of this array is equal to 1.

Returns:
An array describing the goal value distribution associated to this node, or null if it cannot be determined (e.g. because the node is not linked to a tree, or has no associated learning set).
